comments.html:
any worthwhile MPTCP setup utilizing links with heterogeneous properties has a tunable if not entirely programmable packet scheduler (progmp.net is great and it's a shame it stayed an academic thesis project). it just doesn't work otherwise (as mentioned).

I haven't used Tessares product directly but I don't think it's hard to believe they have a plethora of packet scheduler schemes if not an even fancier/cleaner API for it than ProgMP!
comments.name: Aaron A. Glenn
